metadata.title: BOOST High Protein Strawberry Sesame Smoothie

text: BOOST High Protein Strawberry Sesame Smoothie
Sesame gives this breakfast smoothie an exotic taste with tangy fresh strawberry flavour from the Boost.
Combine BOOSTÂ® High Protein Strawberry, tahini, strawberries and lemon juice to blend. Pulse until smooth. Garnish smoothie with toasted sesame seeds.
For a lower sugar option, substitute with Boost Diabetic Strawberry (0.5g sugar vs 14g sugar in Boost High Protein)
To make this gluten free, use gluten free tahini paste
Freeze overripe strawberries instead of throwing them away. Just slice and portion them into re-sealable plastic bags so they are handy.
